text:
Louise Peltzer (born 18 February 1946 in Huahine) is a French Polynesian linguist and professor at the University of French Polynesia. From 2005 to 2011, she was president of the University of French Polynesia.
She taught at Institut national des langues et civilisations orientales and University of Waikato.

annotations.surface_form: Institut national des langues et civilisations orientales
